Articles.Content: Been playing KSP on mac for a while, I like the idea of 64bit and more RAM access so I installed dual boot Ubuntu 14.04. I'm aware of some of the issues associated with Linux, but this is not one I've been able to find anywhere...

That looks like the problem with anti-aliasing in Unity on Linux. Try disabling anti-aliasing in the game. If you want anti-aliasing, you can enable it in the graphics driver. There's more discussion in this thread.
